document.full_text: there is no technical reason that the crisis at japan's fukushima daiichi nuclear plant will slow down relicensing of u.s. nuclear reactors, a top official from the u.s. nuclear regulatory commission said on tuesday.
document.title: japan crisis to not slow relicensing u.s. plants: nrc
lines_and_colors: there is no technical reason that the crisis at japan's fukushima daiichi nuclear plant will slow down relicensing of u.s. nuclear reactors, a top official from the u.s. nuclear regulatory commission said on tuesday.
